item.title: Deploying a Web Application
item.description: This runbook outlines the steps to deploy a web application. Prerequisites Access to the repository Deployment credentials Steps Clone the Repository git clone https://github.com/your-repo/web-app.git cd web-app Install Dependencies npm install Run Tests npm test Build the Application npm run build Deploy to Server scp -r build/ user@server:/var/www/web-app Verification Check the web application at http://your-server-address. Ensure all endpoints are working.
